attributes.action: Require exam boards provide advance information about 2023 exams
attributes.additional_details: It’s hard for students to keep up with work when they are missing days due to strikes, and for current A Level students not having the experience of taking GCSEs, therefore the opportunities differ to those in past years. As a chunk of their education has been lost, advanced information would better allow students to take their time learning the relevant information from what’s been missed.
attributes.background: Make exams boards release advanced information to schools and colleges to help with the missed education through Covid and recent strikes.
